metadata.Title: CVE-2019-18889 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Symfony 3.4.0 through 3.4.34, 4.2.0 through 4.2.11, and 4.3.0 through 4.3.7. Serializing certain cache adapter interfaces could result in remote code injection. This is related to symfony/cache.

criterions.comment: symfony package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.8+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
